title: Barren
description: These places are devoid of life. Their dusty and rocky surfaces have no water present, similar to the surface of Earth’s moon.

title: Exotic
description: Populated by uniquely uncommon features such as rivers of molten metal, strange rock formations and any combination of flora, fauna and weather conditions. Light is generally refracted by the planet’s atmosphere in a single, unusual color.

title: Frozen
description: This biome is completely covered in ice, making movement slow and difficult. Characters without a Thermic Layer suffer -3 to all actions. Traveling from one Hex to another causes +2⦿, instead of +1.

title: Irradiated
description: Irradiated biomes are created by artificial cataclysmic events or ancient powersource collapse. Natural vents may emit radioactive gases. Characters without radiation protection receive 20 rads/hex.

title: Lush
description: Vibrant flora and fauna of all types abound. Still an alien planet—abundance rarely means safe.

title: Scorched
description: Hard, rocky biomes characterized by extreme heat and little to no flora. Occasional molten metal flows. Characters without a Coolant Layer suffer -3 to all actions and spend (2x) Oxygen Pellets each hex.

title: Toxic
description: High concentration of biochemicals covers surfaces or falls from the sky. Characters without toxin protection suffer Poison III each time they enter a new hex.

title: Urban Ruins
description: Remnants of a long-gone civilization. Rubble and scavenging opportunities abound. Traveling between hexes causes +2⦿ instead of +1.

title: Volcanic
description: Active volcanoes, flowing lava lakes, and rivers. Characters without a Coolant Layer suffer -3 to actions and spend (2x) Oxygen Pellets. Traveling between hexes causes +2⦿.

title: Water
description: Large lakes or oceans with no shore in sight. Ships dive deep underwater. Traveling between hexes causes +2⦿ instead of +1.

title: Same as Current Biome
description: This result indicates no change. Use the same biome the players are currently in.
